__e: I know it's hard to believe this, but I never stopped loving you.
I never stopped loving you even when you chose my best friend over me.
I can see you still have feelings for me, and I know I haven ever stopped loving you.
There's never been a moment ..that I haven't cared about you
From the moment I met you... all those years ago... not a day has gone by when I haven't thought of you.
I've been thinking about this moment continuously since I got my diagnosis.
From the moment I met you... all those years ago... not a day has gone by when I haven't thought of you.
I haven't stopped looking for her since the day she left not a day goes by when I don't think about her...
And I have to get 'em out, because they started one day, and they kept coming and coming...
Because the woman I'm about to see ceased to be my mother the day she abandoned me.
He was such a good father, and a good husband, and he never stopped being your son.
It means that when you were 15, you stopped being my child and started being my daughter.
It's only been a half an hour since we stopped the medicine.
Maybe they quit? Maybe they're through.
I ceased my struggle by choice, not because of you or your Captain.
But I never stopped to think about it or about why... until you asked me to.
I don't know when or why he stopped believing in it... but those stories made me who I am.
I know the other night didn't mean for you what it did for me, but I don't regret it, and I haven't stopped thinking about it since it happened.
But I never stopped to think about it or about why... until you asked me to.
I don't know when or why he stopped believing in it... but those stories made me who I am.
I know the other night didn't mean for you what it did for me, but I don't regret it, and I haven't stopped thinking about it since it happened.
